<P>> Nightstrike get stuck and stunned started to fall but pressed some <BR>> buttons while he try to do a forced landing.<BR>Legacy stopped firing for a moment as he noted Nightstrike' s cessation of fire. He tilted his head slightly as his sensors scanned him, assesing the situation. With a slight flicker of his single optic he shifts form, his armor rearranging itself as he assumed his futuristic tank mode. <BR>"IT WOULD APPEAR THAT THE MINION CALLED NIGHTSTRIKE HAS BEEN TEMPORARILLY DISABLED. I WILL FINISH HIM." Legacy transmitted to Lord Elder as he began moving towards Nightstrike' s position, the main cannon glowing crimson as it came online, as he searched out the temporarilly stunned Nightstrike.<BR>Preston<BR>(Legacy)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
